name: Ibrahim Abe Baggili
content: The Baggili Truth Lab at Louisiana State Univeristy & Center for Computation and Technology Welcome to the BiT Lab Baggil(i) Truth Lab Research. Educate. Find. Rewind. We uncover digital truth at the bit level by conducting applied multidisciplinary research in cybersecurity and cyber forensics. The BiT Lab is joint lab between the Center for Computation & Technology and the LSU Division of Computer Science & Engineering Our Sponsors Key Research Areas IoT / Net Forensics Memory Forensics Storage Forensics AI Forensics Cybersec Education XR Security Our Team Ibrahim (Abe) Baggili Founder & PI Clinton Walker ALUMNI PhD Student / Lecturer Ruba Alsmadi PhD Student LaSean Salmon ALUMNI MSc Student NathÃ¡lia Soares ALUMNIMSc Student Steven Seiden ALUMNI BSc Student Abdur Onik PhD Student & TA Lauren Pace PhD Student / Lecturer Taha Gharaibeh PhD Student Christopher Bowen MSc Student Joseph Brown ALUMNI MSc Student Abdullah Alshaya ALUMNI PhD Student Trevor Spinosa MSc Student Abdullah Asad BSc Student Arushi Ghildayal BSc Student Binaya Sharma ALUMNI MSc Student Roohana Karim MSc Student Uju Okoye PhD Student Coming Soon Student Coming Soon Student Collaborators Golden Richard III PhD Research Collaborator Aisha Ali-Gombe PhD Research Collaborator Hao Wang PhD Research Collaborator Andrew Webb PhD Research Collaborator AJ Burns DBA Research Collaborator James Ghawaly Research Collaborator This website was created with Nicepage
